content: Do we know that sheaves on schemes (with Zariski topology) are equivalent to sheaves on affines (with Zariski topology)?
it seems like we don't even have the Zariski topology on affines
We do not have this yet. In the future, it shall be a consequence of #19444.
Actually, it may also require the new approach to sheafification that is being developed by @Christian Merten.
For the small zariski site this is docs#AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.AffineZariskiSite.sheafEquiv
